data.name: Game Tengoku - Voice Mix
data.detailed_description:
This pack contains new in-game voices for the following characters for use in
Arcade Mode +.

  • Jeynus Starmine (voice: Tomokazu Seki)
  • Selia (voice: Mika Kanai)
  • Z-DYNE MkII (voice: Ryōtarō Okiayu)
  • Pig (voice: Akio Ōtsuka)
  • Momoko (voice: Hekiru Shiina)
  • Miki (voice: Miki Takahashi) & Misato (voice: Satomi Kōrogi)

To use them, go to Arcade Mode + Game Setting and change 'Voice Type' to 'EXTRA Voices'. When enabled, your character will use the new voices in-game.

The pack also includes voices for the following characters which will play throughout the game.

  • Yuki Ito (voice: Kumiko Nishihara)
  • Genius Yamada (voice: Shigeru Chiba)
  • Kato (voice: Masami Suzuki)
  • Nakamura (voice: Kumiko Ise)
data.about_the_game:
This pack contains new in-game voices for the following characters for use in
Arcade Mode +.

  • Jeynus Starmine (voice: Tomokazu Seki)
  • Selia (voice: Mika Kanai)
  • Z-DYNE MkII (voice: Ryōtarō Okiayu)
  • Pig (voice: Akio Ōtsuka)
  • Momoko (voice: Hekiru Shiina)
  • Miki (voice: Miki Takahashi) & Misato (voice: Satomi Kōrogi)

To use them, go to Arcade Mode + Game Setting and change 'Voice Type' to 'EXTRA Voices'. When enabled, your character will use the new voices in-game.

The pack also includes voices for the following characters which will play throughout the game.

  • Yuki Ito (voice: Kumiko Nishihara)
  • Genius Yamada (voice: Shigeru Chiba)
  • Kato (voice: Masami Suzuki)
  • Nakamura (voice: Kumiko Ise)
data.short_description: Adds unused voices from the original console version for all main characters and a few bonuses too!
data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT440
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
